synopsis: The cute little tale teaches the values of camaraderie and trust  by adding a  new twist to the  fable of the hare and the tortoise.
title: Toto And Hari

layers.option1: Hari's mother's story about the grandfather
layers.option2: Hares seeking shelter atop the hill
layers.option3: Toto and Family's rescue mission to save the hares
layers.title: Toto and Hari

layers.html: On an island in the middle of a river lived two friends- Toto, the tortoise and Hari, the hare. Hari's mother kept telling him not to play with Toto. “His great, great paternal grandpa Arjun and your great, great maternal grandpa Karan had run a race. Arjun had won by cheating.”
layers.name: text
layers.text: On an island in the middle of a river lived two friends- Toto, the tortoise and Hari, the hare. Hari's mother kept telling him not to play with Toto. “His great, great paternal grandpa Arjun and your great, great maternal grandpa Karan had run a race. Arjun had won by cheating.”

layers.html: “Just before the race Arjun had mixed some weeds in grandpa Karan's carrot juice. As a result poor grandpa had felt sleepy and dozed off. Since then we hares are not on talking terms with the tortoises.” Hari kept quiet but continued to be friendly with Toto.
layers.name: text
layers.text: “Just before the race Arjun had mixed some weeds in grandpa Karan's carrot juice. As a result poor grandpa had felt sleepy and dozed off. Since then we hares are not on talking terms with the tortoises.” Hari kept quiet but continued to be friendly with Toto.

layers.html: One day there was very heavy rain and the river started rising. The hares climbed on to a hill. The tortoises swam to the opposite bank where there was dry land. Soon the hill where the hares had taken shelter was also in danger of getting submerged. Seeing this Toto told his father, "Papa, let us rescue Hari and his family." Toto's Papa hesitated for a few seconds and then agreed.
layers.name: text
layers.text: One day there was very heavy rain and the river started rising. The hares climbed on to a hill. The tortoises swam to the opposite bank where there was dry land. Soon the hill where the hares had taken shelter was also in danger of getting submerged. Seeing this Toto told his father, "Papa, let us rescue Hari and his family." Toto's Papa hesitated for a few seconds and then agreed.

layers.html: Twenty tortoises jumped in the water and swam across to the island. "Come, climb on to our backs and we will carry you ashore," they told the hares. The hares were not quite sure whether they could trust their enemies. Hari took the lead and jumped on to Toto's back. His parents, uncles and aunts followed. The tortoises carried them safely to the opposite bank. Later Hari told his mother, "See mum, if it wasn't for Toto and his family we would all be dead by now." "Yes, my child you are right. It was your friendship with Toto that saved our lives," she said.
layers.name: text

The hares were not quite sure whether they could trust their enemies. Hari took the lead and jumped on to Toto's back. His parents, uncles and aunts followed. The tortoises carried them safely to the opposite bank. Later Hari told his mother, "See mum, if it wasn't for Toto and his family we would all be dead by now." "Yes, my child you are right. It was your friendship with Toto that saved our lives," she said.
